elements.subject: Improve the resiliency/reliability of the  Workflow Management System to decrease processing tails Q3 2023

description.raw: A major challenge facing the WM system is the timely completion of workflows (WFs) because of long tails in WF completion time.  Failures that require human effort from which to recover comprise a major source of long workflow tails.  These failures can be addressed through **reliability** (having a smaller failure rate) or **resiliency** (the ability to recover automatically in the face of failures).
description.html: A major challenge facing the WM system is the timely completion of workflows (WFs) because of long tails in WF completion time.  Failures that require human effort from which to recover comprise a major source of long workflow tails.  These failures can be addressed through reliability (having a smaller failure rate) or resiliency (the ability to recover automatically in the face of failures).

elements.subject: Improve the resiliency/reliability of the  Workflow Management System to decrease processing tails Q4 2023

description.raw: A major challenge facing the WM system is the timely completion of workflows (WFs) because of long tails in WF completion time.  Failures that require human effort from which to recover comprise a major source of long workflow tails.  These failures can be addressed through **reliability** (having a smaller failure rate) or **resiliency** (the ability to recover automatically in the face of failures).
description.html: A major challenge facing the WM system is the timely completion of workflows (WFs) because of long tails in WF completion time.  Failures that require human effort from which to recover comprise a major source of long workflow tails.  These failures can be addressed through reliability (having a smaller failure rate) or resiliency (the ability to recover automatically in the face of failures).

elements.subject: Alpaka infrastructure development

description.raw:
*   [Migrate AlpakaTest unit tests to use the new test declarations #564](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/564)
*   [Allow ESHandle be constructed from a whyFailedFactory of another ESHandle #699](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/699)
*    [Make empty std::optional to work as ESProducer::produce() return value #700](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/700)
*    [Allow Alpaka ESProducer to produce a 'null' data product #636](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/636)

Also the following tasks that were part of [#316](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/316)

*   [Store Alpaka EDProducer backend in an event data product #512](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/512)
*   [Update AlpakaCore README for the ESProducer change #517](https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/517)
description.html:
• Migrate AlpakaTest unit tests to use the new test declarations #564
  • Allow ESHandle be constructed from a whyFailedFactory of another ESHandle #699
  •  Make empty std::optional to work as ESProducer::produce() return value #700
  •  Allow Alpaka ESProducer to produce a 'null' data product #636

Also the following tasks that were part of #316

  • Store Alpaka EDProducer backend in an event data product #512
  • Update AlpakaCore README for the ESProducer change #517

elements.subject: Provide support for “Improve memory usage in ParameterSet” in earlier CMSSW releases

description.raw: Matti backported Chris’ earlier “Improve memory usage in ParameterSet” PR to 13\_0\_X nad 12\_4\_X in order to build special releases in those cycles that can read files produced with 14\_0\_X, that will be needed to run the HLT step of the upcoming 2022 and 2023 MC production campaigns in the data taking releases of those years. He opened a PR for the 13\_0\_X backport.
description.html: Matti backported Chris’ earlier “Improve memory usage in ParameterSet” PR to 13_0_X nad 12_4_X in order to build special releases in those cycles that can read files produced with 14_0_X, that will be needed to run the HLT step of the upcoming 2022 and 2023 MC production campaigns in the data taking releases of those years. He opened a PR for the 13_0_X backport.
